experience: You and Nicole both know Stephen Kowal, Jonathan Cottrell, and 50 others

Endurance International Group is dedicated to helping small business owners navigate their online journey - by providing cloud presence solutions, online resources & security and business applications.• Manage the daily operations of recruiting staff• Evaluate, develop and implement recruiting standards, to ensure consistency• Assess advertising needs and select appropriate methods for new opportunities. Utilize job fairs, conferences and other traditional/nontraditional applicant sourcing opportunities to determine which will provide the greatest benefit. • Prepare reports as necessary and assure the integrity, timeliness and maintenance of the data. • Manage contractor and agency negotiations and contracts. • Actively perform day to day recruiting functions to source, qualify and present candidates to hiring managers.• Assist hiring managers with the development of position descriptions• Train hiring managers on behavioral interview skills techniques• Lead the hiring of all internal recruitment positions

• Established recruitment department in terms of tracking, policies and procedures and NHO• Manage all aspects of the recruiting and hiring process for all exempt/non exempt positions within the company, including sourcing, branding, screening, background checks, extending offers and facilitation of NHO.• Extend and negotiate employment offers with candidates by selling both the company and the position.• Develop and implement creative and successful recruiting strategies identifying high-calibre candidates through direct sourcing/cold calling, networking and marketing/advertising campaigns (professional associations, internet, colleges and the employee referral program • Update recruiting/employment company policies as needed.• Created candidate tracking system as well as tracking for open/closed job requisition orders.

• Partner closely with internal client group to understand their needs, educate them about the market, and coach them on the interviewing and hiring process• Manage the full recruitment cycle for various positions• Create customized compensation packages for each hired candidate• Source for candidates through attendance at job fairs, internet mining and open houses

• Responsible for end-to-end recruitment process of client group which includes Audit, Control Services, Database Marketing, Technology and high volume Sales Call Center roles, from specialist to VP level.• Built effective working relationships with hiring managers, understanding their recruitment needs and advising on best strategy to fulfil their recruitment requirements• Created and implemented Selection Center for Call Center Specialists• Facilitated education for Peer Interview Accreditation, New Manager Interview Accreditation, Manager Assessors for Assessment Center and Admin for New Managers• Revised and implemented new Exit Interview Process including feedback to Senior Management.• Created role specific, behavioural and competency interview questions and improved Management Interview Assessment Template

summary: Harkins Theatres is a family owned and operated business, founded and based in Scottsdale, Arizona since 1933. The largest independently owned exhibitor in the nation; operating more than 500 screens across five states including Arizona, California, Colorado, Oklahoma and Texas. For over 84 years, Harkins Theatres has consistently reinvented the landscape of movie-going. As the fifth largest theatre chain in North America, Harkins Theatres has become the most recognized and trusted name in the motion picture exhibition industry in the Southwest.
